ground_truth.thought: 获取移动支付终端的用户体验评估数据
ground_truth.name: PaymentExperience.get_mobile_payment_data

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'PaymentExperience.get_mobile_payment_data', 'description': 'Get user experience data for mobile payment terminals.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'query', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the content of search query'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'content', 'description': 'a list of user experience data for mobile payment terminals'}]}, {'name': 'PaymentExperience.get_traditional_payment_data', 'description': 'Get user experience data for traditional payment terminals.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'query', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the content of search query'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'content', 'description': 'a list of user experience data for traditional payment terminals'}]}, {'name': 'PaymentExperience.compare_user_experience', 'description': 'Compare user experience data between mobile and traditional payment terminals.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'mobile_data', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'user experience data for mobile payment terminals'}, {'name': 'traditional_data', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'user experience data for traditional payment terminals'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'comparison_result', 'description': 'the comparison result of user experience between mobile and traditional payment terminals'}]}]
我需要评估移动支付与传统支付在支付终端用户体验方面的差异。首先，获取移动支付终端的用户体验评估数据。然后，获取传统支付方式终端的用户体验评估数据。接着，比较两者的差异，并分析这种差异对用户满意度的影响。最后，提供基于支付终端用户体验的支付方式选择建议。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取移动支付终端的用户体验评估数据
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
